titles.title: BRIDGE to Congress Resolution
BRIDGE to Congress Resolution
Bringing Real Ideas, Data, and Genuine Experience to Congress Resolution
Eliminating the restriction that witnesses may appear remotely at proceedings of committees of the House of Representatives only at the discretion of the chair of the committee.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary:
Bringing Real Ideas, Data, and Genuine Experience to Congress Resolution or BRIDGE to Congress Resolution
This resolution eliminates the requirement for committee chair approval for witnesses to testify remotely before committees of the House of Representatives during the 118th Congress.
